name: Forgotten God
description: The Forgotten God embodies divine attributes with a formidable presence, featuring a combination of exceptional physical strength, with high Strength and Constitution scores, and potent magical abilities. It has a radiant aura and can wield melee attacks that inflict radiant damage.
memorable: It's a complex celestial being able to shift between different alignments, and its flawed spellcasting introduces unpredictability in combat.
goals: To impose its will on the battlefield and control the actions of its foes through spells and stunning attacks.
relations: Could be associated with other celestial beings or serve as a powerful entity influencing other elusively divine creatures.
environment: Typically found in celestial realms or as a guardian in regions of divine significance.
strengths: High physical and magical defenses, along with the ability to manipulate the battlefield using spells like Spirit Guardians and Flame Strike.
weaknesses: Flawed spellcasting can lead to failures, creating unpredictability in its abilities.
attacks: Melee weapon attacks that deal radiant damage; an ability to stun enemies with radiant damage; strong area control with spells.
most_powerful_ability: Divine Wrath, capable of inflicting significant radiant damage to multiple foes simultaneously.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, enhancing its ability to detect hidden foes.
skills: Proficient in arcana, history, intimidation, perception, persuasion, and religion, showcasing versatility in various scenarios.
additional_information: Resistant to poison and radiant damage
Immune to conditions like fatigue and fear
Does not require air, sustenance, or sleep
Can shift alignments impacting its behavior
Has legendary resistance to succeed on failed saving throws
spellcasting: Can cast Spirit Guardians and Flame Strike, with a risk of failure due to flawed spellcasting mechanics.
test_queries: powerful celestial being with radiant attacks
divine creature that can fly and deal radiant damage
forgotten god with flawed spellcasting abilities
celestial monster that can manipulate alignments
large divine entity with stunning gaze ability
